01479       sprintf(pbuf, "%%ID EOR NR %ld\n", (long) pevent->serial_number);
01480    else
01481       sprintf(pbuf, "%%ID %d TR %d NR %ld\n", pevent->event_id, pevent->trigger_mask,
01482               (long) pevent->serial_number);
01483    STR_INC(pbuf, buffer);
01484 
01485   /*---- MIDAS format ----------------------------------------------*/
01486    if (event_def->format == FORMAT_MIDAS) {
01487       LRS1882_DATA *lrs1882;
01488       LRS1877_DATA *lrs1877;
01489       LRS1877_HEADER *lrs1877_header;
01490 
01491       pbh = (BANK_HEADER *) (pevent + 1);
01492       bk_swap(pbh, FALSE);
01493 
01494       pbk = NULL;
01495       pbk32 = NULL;
01496       do {
01497          /* scan all banks */
01498          if (bk_is32(pbh)) {
01499             size = bk_iterate32(pbh, &pbk32, &pdata);
01500             if (pbk32 == NULL)
01501                break;
01502             bkname = *((DWORD *) pbk32->name);
01503             bktype = (WORD) pbk32->type;
01504          } else {
01505             size = bk_iterate(pbh, &pbk, &pdata);
01506             if (pbk == NULL)
01507                break;
01508             bkname = *((DWORD *) pbk->name);
01509             bktype = (WORD) pbk->type;
01510          }
01511 
01512          if (rpc_tid_size(bktype & 0xFF))
01513             size /= rpc_tid_size(bktype & 0xFF);
01514 
01515          lrs1882 = (LRS1882_DATA *) pdata;
01516          lrs1877 = (LRS1877_DATA *) pdata;
01517          lrs1877_header = (LRS1877_HEADER *) pdata;
01518 
01519          /* write bank header */
01520          *((DWORD *) name) = bkname;
01521 
01522          if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == 0)
01523             strcpy(type_name, rpc_tid_name(bktype & 0xFF));
01524          else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_LRS1882)
01525             strcpy(type_name, "LRS1882");
01526          else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_LRS1877)
01527             strcpy(type_name, "LRS1877");
01528          else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_PCOS3)
01529             strcpy(type_name, "PCOS3");
01530          else
01531             strcpy(type_name, "unknown");
01532 
01533          sprintf(pbuf, "BK %s TP %s SZ %d\n", name, type_name, size);
01534          STR_INC(pbuf, buffer);
01535 
01536          /* write data */
01537          for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
01538             if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == 0)
01539                db_sprintf(pbuf, pdata, size, i, bktype & 0xFF);
01540 
01541             else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_LRS1882)
01542                sprintf(pbuf, "GA %d CH %02d DA %d",
01543                        lrs1882[i].geo_addr, lrs1882[i].channel, lrs1882[i].data);
01544 
01545             else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_LRS1877) {
01546                if (i == 0)      /* header */
01547                   sprintf(pbuf, "GA %d BF %d CN %d",
01548                           lrs1877_header[i].geo_addr, lrs1877_header[i].buffer,
01549                           lrs1877_header[i].count);
01550                else             /* data */
01551                   sprintf(pbuf, "GA %d CH %02d ED %d DA %1.1lf",
01552                           lrs1877[i].geo_addr, lrs1877[i].channel, lrs1877[i].edge,
01553                           lrs1877[i].data * 0.5);
01554             }
01555 
01556             else if ((bktype & 0xFF00) == TID_PCOS3)
01557                *pbuf = '\0';
01558             else
01559                db_sprintf(pbuf, pdata, size, i, bktype & 0xFF);
01560 
01561             strcat(pbuf, "\n");
01562             STR_INC(pbuf, buffer);
01563          }
01564 
01565       } while (1);
01566    }
01567 
01568   /*---- FIXED format ----------------------------------------------*/
01569    if (event_def->format == FORMAT_FIXED) {
01570       if (event_def->hDefKey == 0)
01571          cm_msg(MERROR, "dump_write", "cannot find event definition");
01572       else {
01573          pdata = (char *) (pevent + 1);
01574          for (i = 0;; i++) {
01575             status = db_enum_key(hDB, event_def->hDefKey, i, &hKey);
01576             if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
01577                break;
01578 
01579             db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
01580             sprintf(pbuf, "%s\n", key.name);
01581             STR_INC(pbuf, buffer);
01582 
01583             /* adjust for alignment */
01584             pdata = (void *) VALIGN(pdata, MIN(ss_get_struct_align(), key.item_size));
01585 
01586             for (j = 0; j < key.num_values; j++) {
01587                db_sprintf(pbuf, pdata, key.item_size, j, key.type);
01588                strcat(pbuf, "\n");
01589                STR_INC(pbuf, buffer);
01590             }
01591 
01592             /* shift data pointer to next item */
01593             pdata = ((char *) pdata) + key.item_size * key.num_values;
01594          }
01595       }
01596    }
01597 
01598   /*---- ASCII format ----------------------------------------------*/
01599    if (event_def->format == FORMAT_ASCII) {
01600       /* write event header to device */
01601       size = strlen(buffer);
01602       if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE)
01603          status = ss_tape_write(log_chn->handle, buffer, size);
01604       else
01605          status = write(log_chn->handle, buffer, size) ==
01606              size ? SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01607 
01608       /* write event directly to device */
01609       size = strlen((char *) (pevent + 1));
01610       if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE)
01611          status = ss_tape_write(log_chn->handle, (char *) (pevent + 1), size);
01612       else if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP)
01613          status = ftp_send(((FTP_CON *) log_chn->ftp_con)->data, buffer, size) == size ?
01614              SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01615       else
01616          status = write(log_chn->handle, (char *) (pevent + 1), size) ==
01617              size ? SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01618    } else {
01619       /* non-ascii format: only write buffer */
01620 
01621       /* insert empty line after each event */
01622       strcat(pbuf, "\n");
01623       size = strlen(buffer);
01624 
01625       /* write record to device */
01626       if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE)
01627          status = ss_tape_write(log_chn->handle, buffer, size);
01628       else if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_FTP)
01629          status = ftp_send(((FTP_CON *) log_chn->ftp_con)->data, buffer, size) == size ?
01630              SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01631       else
01632          status = write(log_chn->handle, buffer, size) ==
01633              size ? SS_SUCCESS : SS_FILE_ERROR;
01634    }
01635 
01636    /* update statistics */
01637    log_chn->statistics.events_written++;
01638    log_chn->statistics.bytes_written += size;
01639    log_chn->statistics.bytes_written_total += size;
01640 
01641    return status;
01642 }

02454       cm_msg(MINFO, "log_write", "Write operation took %d ms", actual_time - start_time);
02455 
02456    if (status != SS_SUCCESS && !stop_requested) {
02457       if (status == SS_IO_ERROR)
02458          cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "Physical IO error on %s, stopping run",
02459                 log_chn->path);
02460       else
02461          cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "Error writing to %s, stopping run", log_chn->path);
02462 
02463       stop_requested = TRUE;
02464       cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, ASYNC, DEBUG_TRANS);
02465       stop_requested = FALSE;
02466 
02467       return status;
02468    }
02469 
02470    /* check if event limit is reached */
02471    if (!stop_requested && !in_stop_transition &&
02472        log_chn->settings.event_limit > 0 &&
02473        log_chn->statistics.events_written >= log_chn->settings.event_limit) {
02474       stop_requested = TRUE;
02475 
02476       cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "stopping run after having received %d events",
02477              log_chn->settings.event_limit);
02478 
02479       status = cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, ASYNC, DEBUG_TRANS);
02480       if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
02481          cm_msg(MERROR, "log_write", "cannot stop run after reaching event limit");
02482       stop_requested = FALSE;
02483 
02484       /* check if autorestart, main loop will take care of it */
02485       size = sizeof(BOOL);
02486       flag = FALSE;
02487       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Auto restart", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
02488 
02489       if (flag)
02490          auto_restart = ss_time() + 5; /* start in 5 sec. */
02491 
02492       return status;
02493    }
02494 
02495    /* check if byte limit is reached */
02496    if (!stop_requested && !in_stop_transition &&
02497        log_chn->settings.byte_limit > 0 &&
02498        log_chn->statistics.bytes_written >= log_chn->settings.byte_limit) {
02499       stop_requested = TRUE;
02500 
02501       cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "stopping run after having received %1.0lf mega bytes",
02502              log_chn->statistics.bytes_written / 1E6);
02503 
02504       status = cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, ASYNC, DEBUG_TRANS);
02505       if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
02506          cm_msg(MERROR, "log_write", "cannot stop run after reaching bytes limit");
02507       stop_requested = FALSE;
02508 
02509       /* check if autorestart, main loop will take care of it */
02510       size = sizeof(BOOL);
02511       flag = FALSE;
02512       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Auto restart", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
02513 
02514       if (flag)
02515          auto_restart = ss_time() + 5; /* start in 5 sec. */
02516 
02517       return status;
02518    }
02519 
02520    /* check if capacity is reached for tapes */
02521    if (!stop_requested && !in_stop_transition &&
02522        log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE &&
02523        log_chn->settings.tape_capacity > 0 &&
02524        log_chn->statistics.bytes_written_total >= log_chn->settings.tape_capacity) {
02525       stop_requested = TRUE;
02526       cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "tape capacity reached, stopping run");
02527 
02528       /* remember tape name */
02529       strcpy(tape_name, log_chn->path);
02530       stats_hkey = log_chn->stats_hkey;
02531 
02532       status = cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, ASYNC, DEBUG_TRANS);
02533       if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
02534          cm_msg(MERROR, "log_write", "cannot stop run after reaching tape capacity");
02535       stop_requested = FALSE;
02536 
02537       /* rewind tape */
02538       ss_tape_open(tape_name, O_RDONLY, &htape);
02539       cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "rewinding tape %s, please wait", log_chn->path);
02540 
02541       cm_get_watchdog_params(&watchdog_flag, &watchdog_timeout);
02542       cm_set_watchdog_params(watchdog_flag, 300000);    /* 5 min for tape rewind */
02543       ss_tape_unmount(htape);
02544       ss_tape_close(htape);
02545       cm_set_watchdog_params(watchdog_flag, watchdog_timeout);
02546 
02547       /* zero statistics */
02548       dzero = izero = 0;
02549       db_set_value(hDB, stats_hkey, "Bytes written total", &dzero,
02550                    sizeof(dzero), 1, TID_DOUBLE);
02551       db_set_value(hDB, stats_hkey, "Files written", &izero, sizeof(izero), 1, TID_INT);
02552 
02553       cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "Please insert new tape and start new run.");
02554 
02555       return status;
02556    }
02557 
02558    /* stop run if less than 10MB free disk space */
02559    actual_time = ss_millitime();
02560    if (log_chn->type == LOG_TYPE_DISK && actual_time - last_checked > 1000) {
02561       last_checked = actual_time;
02562 
02563       if (ss_disk_free(log_chn->path) < 1E7 && !stop_requested && !in_stop_transition) {
02564          stop_requested = TRUE;
02565          cm_msg(MTALK, "log_write", "disk nearly full, stopping run");
02566 
02567          status = cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, ASYNC, DEBUG_TRANS);
02568          if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
02569             cm_msg(MERROR, "log_write", "cannot stop run after reaching byte limit");
02570          stop_requested = FALSE;
02571       }
02572    }
02573 
02574    return status;
02575 }

01196    size_left = TAPE_BUFFER_SIZE - (INT) ((char *) info->write_pointer - (char *) info->buffer);
01197 
01198    if (size_left < evt_size) {
01199       /* copy first part of event */
01200       memcpy(info->write_pointer, pevent, size_left);
01201       info->write_pointer += size_left;
01202 
01203       /* flush buffer */
01204       status = midas_flush_buffer(log_chn);
01205       if (status != SS_SUCCESS)
01206          return status;
01207 
01208       /* several writes for large events */
01209       while (evt_size - size_left >= TAPE_BUFFER_SIZE) {
01210          memcpy(info->buffer, (char *) pevent + size_left, TAPE_BUFFER_SIZE);
01211          info->write_pointer += TAPE_BUFFER_SIZE;
01212          size_left += TAPE_BUFFER_SIZE;
01213 
01214          status = midas_flush_buffer(log_chn);
01215          if (status != SS_SUCCESS)
01216             return status;
01217       }
01218 
01219       /* copy remaining part of event */
01220       memcpy(info->buffer, (char *) pevent + size_left, evt_size - size_left);
01221       info->write_pointer = info->buffer + (evt_size - size_left);
01222    } else {
01223       /* copy event to buffer */
01224       memcpy(info->write_pointer, pevent, evt_size);
01225       info->write_pointer += evt_size;
01226    }
01227 
01228    /* update statistics */
01229    log_chn->statistics.events_written++;
01230    log_chn->statistics.bytes_written += pevent->data_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER);
01231    log_chn->statistics.bytes_written_total += pevent->data_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER);
01232 
01233    return SS_SUCCESS;
01234 }

03179       status = db_create_record(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Channels/0/", strcomb(chn_settings_str));
03180       if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
03181          strcpy(error, "Cannot create channel entry in database");
03182          cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03183          return 0;
03184       }
03185 
03186       status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Channels", &hKeyRoot);
03187       if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
03188          strcpy(error, "Cannot create channel entry in database");
03189          cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03190          return 0;
03191       }
03192    }
03193 
03194    for (index = 0; index < MAX_CHANNELS; index++) {
03195       status = db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyRoot, index, &hKeyChannel);
03196       if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
03197          break;
03198 
03199       /* correct channel record */
03200       db_get_key(hDB, hKeyChannel, &key);
03201       status = db_check_record(hDB, hKeyRoot, key.name, strcomb(chn_settings_str), TRUE);
03202       if (status != DB_SUCCESS && status != DB_OPEN_RECORD) {
03203          cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", "Cannot create/check channel record");
03204          break;
03205       }
03206 
03207       if (status == DB_SUCCESS || status == DB_OPEN_RECORD) {
03208          /* if file already open, we had an abort on the previous start. So
03209             close and delete file in order to create a new one */
03210          if (log_chn[index].handle) {
03211             log_close(&log_chn[index], run_number);
03212             if (log_chn[index].type == LOG_TYPE_DISK) {
03213                cm_msg(MINFO, "tr_prestart", "Deleting previous file \"%s\"",
03214                       log_chn[index].path);
03215                unlink(log_chn[index].path);
03216             }
03217          }
03218 
03219          /* if FTP channel alreay open, don't re-open it again */
03220          if (log_chn[index].ftp_con)
03221             continue;
03222 
03223          /* save settings key */
03224          status =
03225              db_find_key(hDB, hKeyChannel, "Settings", &log_chn[index].settings_hkey);
03226          if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
03227             strcpy(error, "Cannot find channel settings info");
03228             cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03229             return 0;
03230          }
03231 
03232          /* save statistics key */
03233          status = db_find_key(hDB, hKeyChannel, "Statistics", &log_chn[index].stats_hkey);
03234          if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
03235             strcpy(error, "Cannot find channel statistics info");
03236             cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03237             return 0;
03238          }
03239 
03240          /* clear statistics */
03241          size = sizeof(CHN_STATISTICS);
03242          db_get_record(hDB, log_chn[index].stats_hkey, &log_chn[index].statistics, &size,
03243                        0);
03244 
03245          log_chn[index].statistics.events_written = 0;
03246          log_chn[index].statistics.bytes_written = 0;
03247 
03248          db_set_record(hDB, log_chn[index].stats_hkey, &log_chn[index].statistics, size,
03249                        0);
03250 
03251          /* get channel info structure */
03252          chn_settings = &log_chn[index].settings;
03253          size = sizeof(CHN_SETTINGS);
03254          status =
03255              db_get_record(hDB, log_chn[index].settings_hkey, chn_settings, &size, 0);
03256          if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
03257             strcpy(error, "Cannot read channel info");
03258             cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03259             return 0;
03260          }
03261 
03262          /* don't start run if tape is full */
03263          if (log_chn[index].type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE &&
03264              chn_settings->tape_capacity > 0 &&
03265              log_chn[index].statistics.bytes_written_total >= chn_settings->tape_capacity)
03266          {
03267             strcpy(error, "Tape capacity reached. Please load new tape");
03268             cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03269             return 0;
03270          }
03271 
03272          /* check if active */
03273          if (!chn_settings->active || !write_data)
03274             continue;
03275 
03276          /* check for type */
03277          if (equal_ustring(chn_settings->type, "Tape"))
03278             log_chn[index].type = LOG_TYPE_TAPE;
03279          else if (equal_ustring(chn_settings->type, "FTP"))
03280             log_chn[index].type = LOG_TYPE_FTP;
03281          else if (equal_ustring(chn_settings->type, "Disk"))
03282             log_chn[index].type = LOG_TYPE_DISK;
03283          else {
03284             sprintf(error,
03285                     "Invalid channel type \"%s\", pease use \"Tape\", \"FTP\" or \"Disk\"",
03286                     chn_settings->type);
03287             cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03288             return 0;
03289          }
03290 
03291          data_dir[0] = 0;
03292 
03293          /* if disk, precede filename with directory if not already there */
03294          if (log_chn[index].type == LOG_TYPE_DISK &&
03295              chn_settings->filename[0] != DIR_SEPARATOR) {
03296             size = sizeof(data_dir);
03297             dir[0] = 0;
03298             db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Data Dir", data_dir, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
03299             if (data_dir[0] != 0)
03300                if (data_dir[strlen(data_dir) - 1] != DIR_SEPARATOR)
03301                   strcat(data_dir, DIR_SEPARATOR_STR);
03302             strcpy(str, data_dir);
03303 
03304             /* append subdirectory if requested */
03305             if (chn_settings->subdir_format[0]) {
03306                tzset();
03307                time(&now);
03308                tms = localtime(&now);
03309 
03310                strftime(dir, sizeof(dir), chn_settings->subdir_format, tms);
03311                strcat(str, dir);
03312                strcat(str, DIR_SEPARATOR_STR);
03313             }
03314 
03315             /* create directory if needed */
03316 #ifdef OS_WINNT
03317             status = mkdir(str);
03318 #else
03319             status = mkdir(str, 0755);
03320 #endif
03321 #if !defined(HAVE_MYSQL) && !defined(OS_WINNT) /* errno not working with mySQL lib */
03322             if (status == -1 && errno != EEXIST)
03323                cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", "Cannot create subdirectory %s", str);
03324 #endif
03325 
03326             strcat(str, chn_settings->filename);
03327          } else
03328             strcpy(str, chn_settings->filename);
03329 
03330          /* substitue "%d" by current run number */
03331          if (strchr(str, '%'))
03332             sprintf(path, str, run_number);
03333          else
03334             strcpy(path, str);
03335 
03336          strcpy(log_chn[index].path, path);
03337 
03338          /* write back current file name to ODB */
03339          if (strncmp(path, data_dir, strlen(data_dir)) == 0)
03340             strcpy(str, path + strlen(data_dir));
03341          else
03342             strcpy(str, path);
03343          db_set_value(hDB, hKeyChannel, "Settings/Current filename", str, 256, 1,
03344                       TID_STRING);
03345 
03346          if (log_chn[index].type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE &&
03347              log_chn[index].statistics.bytes_written_total == 0 && tape_message) {
03348             tape_flag = TRUE;
03349             cm_msg(MTALK, "tr_prestart", "mounting tape #%d, please wait", index);
03350          }
03351 
03352          /* open logging channel */
03353          status = log_open(&log_chn[index], run_number);
03354 
03355          /* return if logging channel couldn't be opened */
03356          if (status != SS_SUCCESS) {
03357             if (status == SS_FILE_ERROR)
03358                sprintf(error, "Cannot open file %s (Disk full?)", path);
03359             if (status == SS_FILE_EXISTS)
03360                sprintf(error, "File %s exists already, run start aborted", path);
03361             if (status == SS_NO_TAPE)
03362                sprintf(error, "No tape in device %s", path);
03363             if (status == SS_TAPE_ERROR)
03364                sprintf(error, "Tape error, cannot start run");
03365             if (status == SS_DEV_BUSY)
03366                sprintf(error, "Device %s used by someone else", path);
03367             if (status == FTP_NET_ERROR || status == FTP_RESPONSE_ERROR)
03368                sprintf(error, "Cannot open FTP channel to [%s]", path);
03369             if (status == SS_NO_ROOT)
03370                sprintf(error,
03371                        "No ROOT support compiled into mlogger, please compile with -DHAVE_ROOT flag");
03372 
03373             if (status == SS_INVALID_FORMAT)
03374                sprintf(error,
03375                        "Invalid data format, please use \"MIDAS\", \"YBOS\", \"ASCII\", \"DUMP\" or \"ROOT\"");
03376 
03377             cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03378             return 0;
03379          }
03380 
03381          /* close records if open from previous run start with abort */
03382          if (log_chn[index].stats_hkey)
03383             db_close_record(hDB, log_chn[index].stats_hkey);
03384          if (log_chn[index].settings_hkey)
03385             db_close_record(hDB, log_chn[index].settings_hkey);
03386 
03387          /* open hot link to statistics tree */
03388          status =
03389              db_open_record(hDB, log_chn[index].stats_hkey, &log_chn[index].statistics,
03390                             sizeof(CHN_STATISTICS), MODE_WRITE, NULL, NULL);
03391          if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
03392             cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart",
03393                    "cannot open statistics record, probably other logger is using it");
03394 
03395          /* open hot link to settings tree */
03396          status =
03397              db_open_record(hDB, log_chn[index].settings_hkey, &log_chn[index].settings,
03398                             sizeof(CHN_SETTINGS), MODE_READ, NULL, NULL);
03399          if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
03400             cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart",
03401                    "cannot open channel settings record, probably other logger is using it");
03402 
03403 #ifndef FAL_MAIN
03404          /* open buffer */
03405          status =
03406              bm_open_buffer(chn_settings->buffer, EVENT_BUFFER_SIZE,
03407                             &log_chn[index].buffer_handle);
03408          if (status != BM_SUCCESS && status != BM_CREATED) {
03409             sprintf(error, "Cannot open buffer %s", str);
03410             cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03411             return 0;
03412          }
03413          bm_set_cache_size(log_chn[index].buffer_handle, 100000, 0);
03414 
03415          /* place event request */
03416          status = bm_request_event(log_chn[index].buffer_handle,
03417                                    (short) chn_settings->event_id,
03418                                    (short) chn_settings->trigger_mask,
03419                                    GET_ALL, &log_chn[index].request_id, receive_event);
03420 
03421          if (status != BM_SUCCESS) {
03422             sprintf(error, "Cannot place event request");
03423             cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03424             return 0;
03425          }
03426 
03427          /* open message buffer if requested */
03428          if (chn_settings->log_messages) {
03429             status =
03430                 bm_open_buffer(MESSAGE_BUFFER_NAME, MESSAGE_BUFFER_SIZE,
03431                                &log_chn[index].msg_buffer_handle);
03432             if (status != BM_SUCCESS && status != BM_CREATED) {
03433                sprintf(error, "Cannot open buffer %s", MESSAGE_BUFFER_NAME);
03434                cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03435                return 0;
03436             }
03437 
03438             /* place event request */
03439             status = bm_request_event(log_chn[index].msg_buffer_handle,
03440                                       (short) EVENTID_MESSAGE,
03441                                       (short) chn_settings->log_messages,
03442                                       GET_ALL, &log_chn[index].msg_request_id,
03443                                       receive_event);
03444 
03445             if (status != BM_SUCCESS) {
03446                sprintf(error, "Cannot place event request");
03447                cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03448                return 0;
03449             }
03450          }
03451 #endif
03452       }
03453    }
03454 
03455    if (tape_flag && tape_message)
03456       cm_msg(MTALK, "tr_prestart", "tape mounting finished");
03457 
03458    /* reopen history channels if event definition has changed */
03459    close_history();
03460    status = open_history();
03461    if (status != CM_SUCCESS) {
03462       sprintf(error, "Error in history system, aborting run start");
03463       cm_msg(MERROR, "tr_prestart", error);
03464       return 0;
03465    }
03466 
03467    /* write transition event into history */
03468    eb.transition = STATE_RUNNING;
03469    eb.run_number = run_number;
03470    hs_write_event(0, &eb, sizeof(eb));
03471 
03472 #ifdef HAVE_MYSQL
03473    /* write to SQL database if requested */
03474    write_sql(TRUE);
03475 #endif
03476 
03477    return CM_SUCCESS;
03478 }

03487      Wait until buffers are empty, then close logging channels

03489 \********************************************************************/
03490 {
03491    INT i, size;
03492    BOOL flag, tape_flag = FALSE;
03493    char filename[256];
03494    char str[256];
03495 
03496    if (in_stop_transition)
03497       return CM_SUCCESS;
03498 
03499    in_stop_transition = TRUE;
03500    for (i = 0; i < MAX_CHANNELS; i++) {
03501       if (log_chn[i].handle || log_chn[i].ftp_con) {
03502          /* generate MTALK message */
03503          if (log_chn[i].type == LOG_TYPE_TAPE && tape_message) {
03504             tape_flag = TRUE;
03505             cm_msg(MTALK, "tr_poststop", "closing tape channel #%d, please wait", i);
03506          }
03507 #ifndef FAL_MAIN
03508          /* wait until buffer is empty */
03509          if (log_chn[i].buffer_handle) {
03510 #ifdef DELAYED_STOP
03511             DWORD start_time;
03512 
03513             start_time = ss_millitime();
03514             do {
03515                cm_yield(100);
03516             } while (ss_millitime() - start_time < DELAYED_STOP);
03517 #else
03518             INT n_bytes;
03519             do {
03520                bm_get_buffer_level(log_chn[i].buffer_handle, &n_bytes);
03521                if (n_bytes > 0)
03522                   cm_yield(100);
03523             } while (n_bytes > 0);
03524 #endif
03525          }
03526 #endif                          /* FAL_MAIN */
03527 
03528          /* close logging channel */
03529          log_close(&log_chn[i], run_number);
03530 
03531          /* close statistics record */
03532          db_set_record(hDB, log_chn[i].stats_hkey, &log_chn[i].statistics,
03533                        sizeof(CHN_STATISTICS), 0);
03534          db_close_record(hDB, log_chn[i].stats_hkey);
03535          db_close_record(hDB, log_chn[i].settings_hkey);
03536          log_chn[i].stats_hkey = log_chn[i].settings_hkey = 0;
03537       }
03538    }
03539 
03540    /* close buffers */
03541    for (i = 0; i < MAX_CHANNELS; i++) {
03542 #ifndef FAL_MAIN
03543       if (log_chn[i].buffer_handle) {
03544          INT j;
03545 
03546          bm_close_buffer(log_chn[i].buffer_handle);
03547          for (j = i + 1; j < MAX_CHANNELS; j++)
03548             if (log_chn[j].buffer_handle == log_chn[i].buffer_handle)
03549                log_chn[j].buffer_handle = 0;
03550       }
03551 
03552       if (log_chn[i].msg_request_id)
03553          bm_delete_request(log_chn[i].msg_request_id);
03554 #endif
03555 
03556       /* clear channel info */
03557       memset(&log_chn[i].handle, 0, sizeof(LOG_CHN));
03558    }
03559 
03560    /* ODB dump if requested */
03561    size = sizeof(flag);
03562    flag = 0;
03563    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/ODB Dump", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
03564    if (flag) {
03565       strcpy(str, "run%d.odb");
03566       size = sizeof(str);
03567       str[0] = 0;
03568       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/ODB Dump File", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
03569       if (str[0] == 0)
03570          strcpy(str, "run%d.odb");
03571 
03572       /* substitue "%d" by current run number */
03573       if (strchr(str, '%'))
03574          sprintf(filename, str, run_number);
03575       else
03576          strcpy(filename, str);
03577 
03578       odb_save(filename);
03579    }
03580 
03581 #ifdef HAVE_MYSQL
03582    /* write to SQL database if requested */
03583    write_sql(FALSE);
03584 #endif
03585 
03586    in_stop_transition = FALSE;
03587 
03588    if (tape_flag & tape_message)
03589       cm_msg(MTALK, "tr_poststop", "all tape channels closed");
03590 
03591    /* write transition event into history */
03592    eb.transition = STATE_STOPPED;
03593    eb.run_number = run_number;
